descriptor: C returns to his apartment to call ...
C announces to the guys that he phoned Janis
Janis wanted to see C's face when he saw she was married and pregnant
M tries somehow to get rid of Ra's lamp
R tries one last time to convince Pb of the theory of evolution... but gets caught at his own game
M drops Ra's lamp while putting on her jacket
C is comforted by M, Ra w Pb
M gives Ra a clock that she can leave in their apartment to make amends
C announces to them that he has a date
M, Ra w Pb leave the Heckels' apartment
J brings the mega magnifying glass for the TV
R leaves C alone in the Heckels apartment
C bids farewell to Mr. Heckels
During his date, C only thinks about the size of her head
